DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the effect of dapsone gel in female subjects with skin of color (Fitzpatrick Skin Types IV, V, and VI) with acne vulgaris.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of Dapsone Gel in Females With Skin of Color and Acne Vulgaris
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of acne vulgaris Medium to dark complexion (Fitzpatrick Skin Type IV, V or VI) Willing to avoid excessive or prolonged exposure of the face to ultraviolet light (eg, sunlight, tanning beds) throughout the study Received treatment with botulinum toxin of any serotype in the face within 6 months
